title: Impact on Q if monopoly can price discriminate

content.question: Assume that a profit-maximizing monopoly is charging a single price. If the monopoly can price discriminate and charge each consumer what he or she is willing to pay, which of the following will occur?

choices.label: The quantity of output produced will increase.

content.answer: The quantity of output produced will increase.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
